H0.text: Oxygen is the resultant waste product of photosynthesis.

H1.text: Carbon is the resultant waste product of photosynthesis.

H2.text: Argon is the resultant waste product of photosynthesis.

H3.text: Sulfur is the resultant waste product of photosynthesis.

A4.text: Oxygen is a waste product of light-dependent reactions

A5.text: some microbes use sunlight to oxidize arsenite to arsenate: The equation for this reaction is: CO2carbondioxide + (AsO3−3)arsenite + photonslight energy → (AsO3−4)arsenate + COcarbonmonoxide(used to build other compounds in subsequent reactions)
